Description: The Sage Bionetworks project or initiative with which the dataset is associated.
A text description of the dataset. Can be identifical to Dataset Description.
The insitution that generated and/or deposited the data in Synapse. Can be identical to Grant Institution Name.
Keywords associated with the dataset. Can be identical to Publication Keywords.
The number of participants or samples associated with the files in the dataset. Can be identical to Study Number of Participants, DSP Number of Participants, or DSP Number of Samples
The url where the dataset is displayed, typically on a public-facing data portal. Can be identical to Dataset Url.
A Synapse url where the croissant file associated with this dataset is stored.
The manifest used to describe datasets for the Synapse Data Catalog.
DependsOn: Component, DataCatalog_id, community, description, contributors, keywords, individuals, link, croissant

Description: A unique primary key that enables record updates using schematic.
